name: Format\TableBorder
description: The object for setting borders for tables.

properties.name: all
properties.description: Defines the stroke properties of the border. Stroke properties cannot be set for each side; the border can only be disabled or enabled for each side.

properties.name: bottom
properties.description: Indicates whether the border should be applied to the bottom.

properties.name: left
properties.description: Indicates whether the border should be applied to the left side.

properties.name: right
properties.description: Indicates whether the border should be applied to the right side.

properties.name: top
properties.description: Indicates whether the border should be applied to the top.
